title: Flight Logs L0 Schema
description: Layer 0 canonical schema for Epstein flight log records. Source: Internet Archive court exhibits (Bradley Edwards) + FOIA releases. Coverage: November 1995 - 2015 (bulk 1996-2005).

ID.description: Unique record identifier from source dataset

Date.description: Flight date in M/D/YYYY format (US locale)

Year.description: Year extracted from date (bulk records 1996-2005, long tail through 2015)

Aircraft Tail #.description: Aircraft registration (typically FAA N-number, e.g., N908JE). Note: 1 non-N-number in dataset (121TH).

Pass #.description: Passenger position on manifest (e.g., 'Pass 1') or 'No Records' for FOIA entries without passenger data

First Name.description: Passenger first name (may be partial, initials, or descriptive)

Last Name.description: Passenger last name (may be empty for unknown passengers)

Initials.description: Passenger initials as recorded in original logs

Known.description: Whether passenger identity was confirmed by source compiler

Data Source.description: Source document type: 'Flight Log' (primary) or 'FOIA' (supplemental releases)

_meta.patch_notes: Relaxed Year max (2003→2020), Data Source (const→enum), removed strict patterns for Pass # and Tail # per quality audit findings
_meta.l1_evolution: Will decompose into flight_events + flight_passengers per GDR architecture
